## Load dataset:

```{r}
hotels_df = read.csv('hotel_bookings.csv')
```

```{r}
hotels_df$reservation_status_date = as.Date(hotels_df$reservation_status_date, format="%Y-%m-%d")
```

```{r}
hotels_df = hotels_df %>% mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) %>%
                          glimpse()
```
